title: Error with multiple large include_bytes! uses.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code My code is [here](https://github.com/novafacing/qemu-rs.git). The error happens when just compiling the cloned repo with `cargo build`, and I'm not sure how to minimize it since the error comes from `include_bytes!`. Repro may need an `apt-get build-dep qemu && python3 -m pip install meson ninja` before it will compile to the point of the crash. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0 (897e37553 2022-11-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120 commit-date: 2022-11-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0 LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: TryFromIntError(())', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/table.rs:234:49 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f3500f6dd40 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h32eb3e08e874dd27 at /rustc/897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f3500f6dd40 - __clone3 33: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.65.0 (897e37553 2022-11-02) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `qemu` ```
